TopicTitle: can the buildings be modded now?

Articles.Content: Just as the title says. I heard from a dev (mu) in a stream over the weekend that they are more moddable than they were before so the question is how much more moddable?
Yes. The hardcoded "this level of building unlocks x" stuff is moddable now thanks to Mu.
So building art is still locked then?
Building art wasn't ever locked, to my knowledge. In the same way that kerbal art isn't locked. It's just hard to replace.
